stBasicObjects.h File Reference

#include <arboretum/stTypes.h>
#include <arboretum/stException.h>
#include <arboretum/stObject.h>
#include "stBasicObjects.cc"

Go to the source code of this file.

Classes

class  stBasicArrayObject
class  stBasicStringObject

Detailed Description

This file defines a generic array object that implements all methods required by the stObject interface. This object may be used in combination with the metric evaluators defined in the file stBasicMetricEvaluator.h.

Version:
2.0
